title: What font is this ? Used by google on ads
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141018105121im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-2_5229.jpg)

\*Screen capture of some video ad from Google.

This is a beautiful font, looks a bit like Myriad Pro but its not.

I cant find it anywhere, does someone know?
author: jonmod
